title: Sarah Palin: We abolished slavery and got Obama.
subtitle: Rumours: Sarah Palin said that the abolition of slavery enabled President Obama to elect the President, and she was concerned that immigration reform would lead to a Spanish president.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Sarah Palin said that the abolition of slavery had enabled President Obama to elect the President and expressed concern that immigration reform would lead to a Spanish President.
